Name.Text: スクロールシューター

Description.Text: The twin stick shooter pack features a playable character where the camera is positioned almost directly above the character. Control of the character is with either keyboard, controller or virtual joystick on a touch device. Movement and firing, which are both on the X/Y axis are controlled independantly allowing for firing in a different direction than which the character is facing. The level contains several cubes that are affected by the projectiles and several that are not.

트윈 스틱 슈팅 팩은 카메라가 거의 캐릭터에 붙어있는 플레이가능 캐릭터를 특징으로 합니다. 캐릭터 콘트롤은 키보드, 콘트롤러, 터치 디바이스의 가상 조이스틱 중 하나로 가능합니다. 이동과 발사 둘 다 X/Y 축에 있으며 독립적으로 제어되어 캐릭터가 향하는 방향과 다른 방향으로 발사할 수 있습니다. 레벨에는 프로젝타일에 영향받는 큐브 여럿, 받지 않는 큐브도 여럿 들어있습니다.

The twin stick shooter pack features a playable character where the camera is positioned almost directly above the character. Control of the character is with either keyboard, controller or virtual joystick on a touch device. Movement and firing, which are both on the X/Y axis are controlled independantly allowing for firing in a different direction than which the character is facing. The level contains several cubes that are affected by the projectiles and several that are not.

AssetTypes.Text: サウンドウェーブ・スタティックメッシュ

ClassTypes: GameMode, Pawn, Actor, StaticMeshComponent, ProjectileMovementComponent, StaticMeshComponent, PrimitiveComponent, CameraComponent, SpringArmComponent, InputComponent
